description:
Details of proposed provision for refuse and recycling storage pursuant to condition 16 of planning permission ref: P/2012/0338 dated 04/012/2012 for Redevelopment (following demolition of existing industrial/ warehouse buildings) to provide a mixed use development of two buildings. Western block - up to six storeys: 33 affordable housing units (1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom units) and site management office. Eastern block - up to eight storeys; 91 private residential units (1, 2 and 3 bedroom units), 589sq.m of office space (Use Class B1) and child care facility (Use Class D1) of 478sq.m. Vehicular access off Colonial Drive and provision of 12 disabled parking spaces and four integral cycle stores. Ground floor plant and refuse/recycling areas. Provision of footpath on north boundary to link Bollo Lane to Chiswick Business Park, associated public realm, landscaping and children's play space.
 (Please see ref: PP/2013/5625 for doc/plans/info online)
